sentences.english: At many, stress and in-fighting are on the rise because of the threat of job cuts.
sentences.chinese: 裁员的威胁增加了大量的压力和明争暗斗。

sentences.english: He quietly reveled in the rivalry that grew between Anor and Vergere.
sentences.chinese: 拉在暗地里对阿诺和维婕尔之间的明争暗斗十分满意。
